src: A kōrua ta{\ꞌ}e mau {\ꞌ}ana \textbf{pē} Kava.

src: {\ob}E tahi\,{\cb} {\ob}te rāua poki vahine nehenehe\,{\cb}.

src: E tahi rāua poki vahine nehenehe.

src: Mo \textbf{ai} koe he Kiritō...
